content.rendered:
Dance Planet

About

Industry: E-Commerce, Retail, Clothing

Location: Ukraine

Type of software: ERP

Scope of work: Back-end, Front-end, UI/UX Design, Quality Assurance, BA

We have been working with Dance Planet since February 2019. The developed online store functioned well. However, the rapid path of modern technologies, changing trends, and new COVID and post-pandemic economic conditions gave an impetus to rethink the general concept of the store and start an overall system upgrade. Moreover, our client came up with new ideas, needs, and a strategic goal to scale to the European market.
He wanted to transform his online store to a full-fledged ERP system to manage all the items and control the selling process in one place. At the same time, we also have some proposals for further improvements. That’s how we found a common space for the creation of something great.

Technologies

PHP

Laravel 5.7

Postgres DB

Nginx

PHP

Laravel 5.7

Postgres DB

Nginx

Vue.js +
Nuxt js + SSR

figma

Vue.js + Nuxt js + SSR

figma

Challenge

To automatize the management of item-manager-client-delivery service interaction

Previously, each order was processed by many people through its lifecycle. Moreover, this process was complicated by a large number of interdependencies and the client’s business specifics. 

For example, some items are present in the warehouse and some of them need to be purchased for a specific order and it was challenging enough to divide and manage such items uninterruptedly. 

Solution:

We built a system that makes possible the automatic management of each stage of the order processing under the control of one person.
For example: if there is an order without payment, the system automatically prohibits its further implementation, marks that the item should be returned to the warehouse, and changes the order status. At the same time, the system sends a reminder about the required payment to the client. If the waiting period is over and the client doesn’t make the payment, such an order is closed.

Project Team

Roman

Back-end developer

Artem

Back-end developer

Vitalii

Back-end developer

Svitlana

Front-end developer

Andrii

Front-end developer

Ivan

QA Engineer

Oksana

UX/UI Designer

Oleksandr

Project manager,
Business analyst

Sergii

Product owner

Results

Realized the easier way for the clients to navigate through pages and make purchases by ensuring that site works well, loads at a good speed, and has zero bugs.

There’s been a 10–15% increase in sales last autumn due to children going back to school, and clients expect no less than 5% growth per month through Dance Planet website.

Let's start. It's easier than you think.

Contact us

excerpt.rendered: An online dance clothing store that we transformed into a full-fledged ERP system to manage all the items and control the selling process in one place.
